      • compute

        public static <R> RegenerativeSteadyStateAnalysis<R> compute​(PetriNet petriNet,
                                                             R initialRegeneration,
                                                             StateBuilder<R> stateBuilder,
                                                             SuccessionProcessor postProcessor,
                                                             EnumerationPolicy enumerationPolicy,
                                                             StopCriterion absorbingCondition,
                                                             AnalysisLogger l,
                                                             AnalysisMonitor monitor,
                                                             boolean verbose)
        Computes steady-state probabilities for each state.
        Type Parameters:
        R - regeneration type
        Parameters:
        petriNet - Petri net
        initialRegeneration - initial regeneration ofthe analysis
        stateBuilder - builder to be used
        postProcessor - postprocessor to apply to each state
        enumerationPolicy - policy for state selection
        absorbingCondition - absorbing condition
        l - logger
        monitor - monitor
        verbose - whether to output additional information
        Returns:
        result of the analysis
